snippet: A lawyer who had represented the Pakistani doctor who helped the C.I.A. hunt Osama bin Laden was shot dead Tuesday in northwest Pakistan, the local police said.
abstract: Gunmen in Pakistan kill Samiullah Afridi, lawyer of doctor who helped Central Intelligence Agency hunt Osama bin Laden; Jamaatul Ahrar, breakaway faction of Pakistani Taliban, claims responsibility.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer who had represented the Pakistani doctor who helped the C.I.A. hunt Osama bin Laden was shot dead Tuesday in northwest Pakistan, the local police said.
